attributes.action: Honour Article 50 and leave the EU on 29 March 2019, with or without a deal.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s time to leave the EU and unshackle ourselves from the bureaucracy and unelected dictators in the European Commission.

Please support this petition to help see that the democratically confirmed will of our great nation is honoured.

Thank you.
attributes.background:
In 2016, 17.4 million people voted for the UK to leave the EU in the most decisive mandate ever.

Leave means Leave.

No ifs, no buts, just leave, with or without a deal.

The time to act is now and show the will of the majority endures.
